name: artfight decluttered
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
i decided to rearrange and restyle some elements and pages to clear up visual clutter and organize the site better. my main problem with the current layouts is that many elements take up way more space than they need to. they take up all available width rather than conforming to the content and there is no breathing room between any given elements. my second problem are the many colored bars, buttons and info texts that distract from the main content.
additional_info: this is all based on my personal opinions.
